title: BRAND NEW RENOVATED LUXURY 2 BR 1 Bath Home in Port Richmond
description:
BRAND NEW RENOVATED LUXURY 2 BR 1 Bath Home in Port Richmond
Welcome to Mercer St. located in the heart of Port Richmond! Everything in this home is BRAND NEW! This home was gut renovated to the studs!  Many 2 bedroom townhomes in the neighborhood can be very small, but not this one. This one is extra wide plus it goes back pretty deep too! Gourmet kitchen features stainless steel appliances, soft close cabinets and gorgeous quartz countertops! Kitchen has an extra large refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, and center burner stove.  Upstairs you'll find the hall bathroom that is also brand new and was wonderfully redone with quality materials and tasteful colors.  The tile work is gorgeous! The master bedroom is huge. The second bedroom is also large which is rare among rowhomes in this neighborhood.  Both rooms have ample closet space. The backyard has plenty of space for entertaining.  It’s the perfect place to grill, set up a small garden, and have friends over! There is a breezeway to the side of the house, that is not shared with the neighbor, and it runs from the front to the backyard. It’s a good space to store your bikes or trash.  Let’s also mention that a New High Efficiency Heater (this will help you save on utility bills!) and Central Air was just installed. New Hot Water Heater just installed. The basement is clean, nice, and has a professionally installed sump pump to handle any possible water intrusion. Plenty of space for storage! New Roof. Upgraded Electric.  New Washer and Dryer will be installed in basement. Fresh gray paint and real hardwood floors cover both levels of this home. Parking on this side of Port Richmond is much easier!  Don’t settle for a bland rental home without character or charm!
LOCATION: 15 minutes to center city, 5 minutes to I-95,  enjoy restaurants on Somerset St. (Tacconelli’s Pizza, Somerset Splits, Kitty’s Luncheonette, Hinge Café, La Roma). Plenty of great neighborhood bars (Bonk’s Bar, Byrne’s Tavern, Tin Can Bar) Easy access to Fishtown/Northern Liberties without paying a huge rental premium.   Mainstream shopping is at your fingertips on Aramingo Avenue (ShopRite, Wal-mart, Target). 2.5 Miles from Temple University! Just 5 minutes around the corner to the Betsy Ross Bridge to NJ. A couple minutes to I-95.
DETAILS: $1645/month. 1 year lease. Total required to move in: (Total: $4935). Tenant pays gas, electric, and water/sewer. $53 screening fee (background check/income verification) per adult. STRONG stable verifiable income AND financial standing REQUIRED.  Must make minimum of $4900 after taxes per month to qualify. Proof of income required. No prior judgments or evictions in last 4 years.  Renter’s insurance required. NO SMOKING OR VAPING! All applicants are screened very thoroughly. Please do not DISTURB current resident.
PET POLICY:  small dogs (under 20 lbs.) or cats may be considered on CASE by CASE basis. Pets must be spayed/neutered.  All vaccines must be up to date. $45 pet fee/month
Contact:  For quickest response please text or email.

description:
***Photos are of a similar unit, every unit is unique.*** Welcome to 1217 Spring Garden! This five-story building, the first reinforced concrete structure in the city, began life towards the end of the 19th century as the home of the Bilgram Machine Works and was later converted into this uniquely designed loft-style building featuring 40 units in its entirety. Each unit with its own DNA and original structure! As you enter the building using it’s smart building access controls, you’ll find a lobby designed to both pay homage to the building’s 19th-century industrial past and add some 21st-century gloss. You’ll also take notice of its wheel chair accessibility and new elevator in the former freight elevator shaft. Mail room is also located in the main lobby for convenience. Take a ride up to the 3rd floor where you’ll find unit 304. Walk right into the original industrial DNA design including its original hard wood flooring, loft, and brick exposed walls. You’ll surely take notice of it’s high ceiling and solid structure! As you move along you’ll find a large kitchen with plenty of cabinet storage and all of your essential appliances and your two nicely sized bedrooms. title: Gorgeous 3-Bedroom Two-Story Apartment
description: Gorgeous 3-Bedroom Two-Story Apartment with Roof Deck in Graduate Hospital! Available NOW! - This 3-Bedroom/2-Bathroom apartment is located on the second and third floors of a two-unit building in the heart of Graduate Hospital! Located just off of 20th and Christian, you will enjoy being within walking distance to everything Graduate Hospital has to offer while also having access to other great neighborhoods like Fitler Square and Rittenhouse Square! Arrive at the building and immediately fall in love with the charming brick exterior. Entry leads you into a shared foyer where you have a private staircase leading up to your apartment. At the top of the stairs you are met with the first of two large bathrooms, complete with marbled shower stall and great vanity lighting. In the rear of this level is one of the three bedrooms. It has enough space to fit a king-sized bed and complete bedroom set with ease and there is also a large closet which is perfect for storage and organization! This floor also includes the newly remodeled kitchen. Black Stainless Steel appliances are the highlight of the kitchen featuring granite countertops, great cabinet space and open layout. In the middle there is a breakfast bar with room for stools to create an additional dining area. In the front you are overlooking the city with large windows that allow tons of natural light to pour in and make the entire space feel incredibly bright and open. A built-in gas fireplace accents the hardwood flooring and adds the perfect pop of character to the space. The second floor of the apartment features two additional bedrooms with carpet flooring and enough space for queen-sized beds to fit comfortably. The front bedroom has great views of the skyline while the second bedroom has access to the large rooftop deck. This floor also has a bathroom with full-sized bathtub and marbled walls as well as a full-sized washer and dryer! Tenants responsible for all utilities in addition to rent each month.  pets allowed. Conveniently located in Graduate Hospital by Fitler Square. Just a quick walk to the Schuylkill River Boardwalk, Rittenhouse Square, South Street, Broad Street and much more! Easy access to Broad St., I-76, I-95, and I-676 which make commuting throughout the city a breeze. Application Qualifications: Minimum monthly income is 3 times the tenant's portion of the monthly rent, acceptable rental history, acceptable credit history and acceptable criminal history. More specific information provided with the application. To set up a showing send your number .
